quiz_questions.instruction_text: How would you write, 'Do you speak English?' in Georgian?
answer_options: အဂ်လိပ်လိုပြောတတ်ပါလာ?

quiz_questions.instruction_text: Which language has the smallest alphabet consisting of only 12 letters of the ISO basic Latin alphabet without diacritics?
In Japan it's customary to welcome a loved one home after a long day with 'Okaeri!' But this is the romanized spelling. What is welcome home in Japanese Kanji?
answer_options: ຍິນດີຕ້ອນຮັບ
